greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors of n of form 5k+3; a(0) = 0.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} x^(3*k)/(1 - x^(5*k)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 11 2019
mathematica: Join[{0}, Table[d = Divisors[n]; Length[Select[d, Mod[#, 5] == 3 &]], {n, 100}]] (* _T. D. Noe_, Aug 10 2012 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==0, 0, sumdiv(n, d, (d % 5)==3)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 28 2021
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
